required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Neoadjuvant Nab-Paclitaxel and S-1 in Resectable Pancreatic Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Single-arm Trial of Nab-Paclitaxel and S-1 as Neoadjuvant Treatment of Patients With Resectable Pancreatic Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

clinical_study.source: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: There were limited data for nab-paclitaxel and S-1 in pancreatic cancer. To explore the efficacy and safety of neoadjuvant nab-paclitaxel combined with S-1 in patients with resectable pancreatic cancer (stage II and partial stage III defined according to the National Comprehensive Cancer Network definitions ), we designed this study. This study was a single-arm single center prospective phase II clinical study. A total of 72 subjects who meet the criteria will receive neoadjuvant chemotherapy of nab-paclitaxel and S-1 prior to pancreatectomy. Response was reported according to the Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors guidelines (RECIST, version 1.1) .The primary endpoint is objective response rate. The secondary endpoints include R0/R1 resection rate, disease free survival, overall survival and safety.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of first dose until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first,assessed up to 24 months
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients who achieve partial response (PR) or complete response(CR) based on Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors (RECIST1.1)

secondary_outcome.description: proportion of patients who achieved R0/R1 resection

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of first documented progression or metastasis, assessed up to 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: The time between operation and the relapse or metastasis of tumors or death

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of death from any cause or censored at the last day that the patient is documented to be alive, whichever came first, assessed up to 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: The time between randomization and death from any cause or lost to follow-up

arm_group.description: neoadjuvant chemotherapy with Nab-paclitaxel and S-1, repeat every 21 days for 2-4 cycles

intervention.description: Nab-Paclitaxel: 125 mg/m2 d1, 8, during each 3-week cycle. S-1: Body surface area < 1.25 m2, 40 mg bid; Body surface area ≥ 1.25 m2 < 1.50 m2, 50 mg bid; Body surface area ≥1.5 m2, 60 mg bid, d1-14;during each 3-week cycle.

facility.name: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital
